channel.title: The Hon. Rick Berg
channel.description: The Hon. Rick Berg U.S. Representative from North Dakota (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Thank you, Mr. Chairman and delegates,
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: It is a privilege to share with you North Dakota's success story and to voice my support for our next President, Mitt Romney.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: President Obama has put America on the wrong track, but my home state, North Dakota, shows a different way forward.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: We have less than 3% unemployment, rising salaries, and a budget surplus.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: Mr. President, if you're still looking for an example where the private sector is actually doing fine, you can look to North Dakota.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: That is because we don't burden our job creators with red tape.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: We understand ­ just like Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan ­ that small businesses are the engines of our economy, so we get government out of their way and let entrepreneurs build their businesses.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: We trust the individual ­ not big government ­ to make decisions about their money, families, and opportunities.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: This is the North Dakota way.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg

item.title: Mitt Romney shares an understanding of the solutions North Dakota has developed and is prepared to lead where President Obama has left broken promises. With Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan in the White House and a Republican majority in the Senate, our North Dakota way can be the American way.
item.author: The Hon. Rick Berg
